mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member(userId, userName, userPwd, userImg) VALUES (#{userId}, #{userName}, #{userPwd}, #{userImg, jdbcType=VARCHAR})

INSERT INTO memberInfo(userId, birth, tel, gender, zipcode, addr1, addr2, introduce) VALUES (#{userId}, #{birth, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tel, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gender, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zipcode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addr1, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addr2, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{introduce, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET userName = #{userName}, userPwd = #{userPwd}, userImg = #{userImg, jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE userId = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT m.userId, userName, userPwd, userImg, point, NVL(enabled, 0) enabled, TO_CHAR(birth, 'YYYY-MM-DD') birth, tel, gender, zipcode, addr1, addr2, introduce, created_date, modify_date, last_login FROM member m JOIN memberInfo mi ON m.userId = mi.userId WHERE m.userId=#{userId}
mapper.update: UPDATE memberInfo SET last_login = SYSDATE WHERE userId=#{userId}
